title: Buying a new champ help
body: i am just looking for a fun new champ to climb elo with my options are : Bard , Syndra , Illaoi , Rek Sai

replies.body:
* If you wanna climb elo, I would go for Rek'Sai. 
* Syndra is also pretty good because from my experience, people in low elo tilt ultra hard when they see her (I have no idea why)
* Bard is super fun and can get you off tilt due to the amount of sheer fun you are having.
* Illaoi is bae, but is quite hard to do well enough to carry with. 

In the end, it is all up to you. All of the champs you have listed have different play styles, and fit differently into a team composition. 

Good luck choosing ♥

"fun" is subjective. I don't find Rek'sai "fun" but she is worth playing.

I find Bard extremely "fun" but I don't like playing him in ranked.

If you really want to have fun and carry games, go for ekko. once you have gotten his combo down and maybe even a few of his trick plays, hes uber fun and a great mid, jungle or support, and hes not a bad top laner either. all round favourite for me.

rek sai its the funnest across a large number of games

bards no fun solo people arent that good enough
syndra is too edgy, good for higher tier comp
illaoi is whatever more situ pick ie blueside toplane
Syndra is so hard to use TAT
